title: Neil Druckmann Says Don’t Bet On More Last of Us - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.05.25
description:
Check out Monster Hunter Now here! https://mhn-web.onelink.me/ZLW3/tswfcfq5

Don’t bet on more Last of Us, Layoffs at Playstation, and Sega is going all in on its biggest franchises.

- Enter the Greggy-Verse with this month's premium collector item featuring over two dozen versions of Greg Miller beautifully crafted by the incredible Pandamusk.
Grab it before the months end on Patreon.com/KindaFunny
- Pack your bags, trainers, because we’re headed to Johto! The next chapter of our Pokemon Nicklocke journey begins this Friday! Join us after Gamescast for the start of our SoulSilver Nicklocke with a special new main character! Exclusively on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
- Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
   - GAMESCAST - How we’d save WB Games
   - After that is Daredevil: Born Again Ep. 1 & 2 Review, Kinda Funny Screencast
   - The STREAM is Bless plays Dark Souls
- If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
   - Gregway is 16 minutes about how I’m flying to the East Coast tomorrow to be in a movie!
